TopicTitle: Wheel Steering keybind not changing with yaw keybinds

Articles.Content:
Build : 0.1.0.0.20892

Windows 11

Azerty keyboard config (qwerty notation used here),

Bug :

Steering is stuck on "a/d" even after changing yaw keybinds,

I prefer to roll with "a/d" and yaw with "q/e" but after changing those binds (which is bugged btw i've got a topic on that), my steering is still on "a/d" which is now for rolling.
